QueryResult.text: select r.id, c.object_id, c.field_id, c.scenario_id, c.start_date, c.finish_date, s.period, s.start_date, s.finish_date, s.slice, s.calendar_key, s.period_name from prj_blb_slicerequests r, crv_sql_curves c, table( crv_sum_slices_blob_fct( c.object_id, c.field_id, c.scenario_id, c.blob_curve, r.period, r.from_date, r.to_date, null, 'DEFAULT', 'HOURS' ) ) s where r.field = c.field_id and r.from_date < c.finish_date and r.to_date >= c.start_date
